Package ch.unifr.pai.twice.comm.serverPush.client

Interface Summary
RemoteEventHandler<T extends RemoteEvent<?>> The handler for RemoteEvents
RemoteWidget A remote widget is a widget that synchronizes itself through the server push manager
UndoableRemoteEventHandler<E extends UndoableRemoteEvent<?>> The RemoteEventHandler for UndoableRemoteEvents
 

Class Summary
AtmosphereEventWrapper event wrapper for atmosphere
AtmosphereEventWrapperSerializer Serializer for the atmosphere framework
BlockingRemoteEvent<H extends RemoteEventHandler<?>> A blocking remote event is the least responsive.
CommunicationManager A central class to access the different functionalities of messaging
DiscardingRemoteEvent<H extends RemoteEventHandler<?>> A discarding remote event.
RemoteEvent<H extends RemoteEventHandler<?>> The base of a remote event including the event message header
RemoteEventDeserializer The deserializer for remote events.
RemoteEventing The fundamental functionality of the remote eventing mechanism
RemoteEventWrapper<H extends RemoteEventHandler<?>,L extends Event<?>> A wrapper for standard GWT events to be distributable to distant devices.
ServerPush Deprecated.
ServerPushEventBus An extension of the standard GWT event bus which transparently handles remote events and includes security mechanisms such as encryption and signature validation.
UndoableRemoteEvent<H extends UndoableRemoteEventHandler<?>> A special type of event which includes additional undo functionality to establish optimistic concurrency control.
UndoableRemoteEventWrapper<H extends UndoableRemoteEventHandler<?>,L extends Event<?>> A wrapper that transforms standard GWT events to UndoableRemoteEvents
UnidirectionalEventBus The unidirectional event bus is thought to be a fallback solution for devices which either are not capable of establishing a bi-directional communication or such components which do not need bi-directionality because they do not react at real-time on events from external devices.
